obfuscation: ﻿ THE FAMILY , NOT THE STATE , SHOULD DECIDE WHAT SCHOOL AND CHILD CARE THEIR CHILDREN ATTEND !
original: ﻿ THE FAMILY, NOT THE STATE, SHOULD DECIDE WHAT SCHOOL AND CHILD CARE THEIR CHILDREN ATTEND!

obfuscation: INTRODUCTION .
original: INTRODUCTION.

obfuscation: Sweden has a retentive history of centralised power , even since Gustav Vasa and the other autocratic kings into present times with our strong central government in Stockholm..
original: Sweden has a long history of centralised power, even since Gustav Vasa and the other autocratic kings into present times with our strong central government in Stockholm..

obfuscation: Surely the situation with the very retentive period of social democracy in governmental position prepared the ground for the comprehensive school system we have today .
original: Surely the situation with the very long period of social democracy in governmental position prepared the ground for the comprehensive school system we have today.

obfuscation: The intention of providing all pupils with an equal and full education caused the government to impose the comprehensive system in the 60 's .
original: The intention of providing all pupils with an equal and good education caused the government to impose the comprehensive system in the 60's.

obfuscation: The government 's purpose was not bad .
original: The government's aim was not bad.

obfuscation: They wished that more people should be able to attend further and eminent education .
original: They wished that more people should be able to attend further and higher education.

obfuscation: Earlier that was impossible for a lot of persons .
original: Earlier that was impossible for a lot of persons.

obfuscation: Since a more conservative government became the power in the 80 's the uniformity of the situation has altered .
original: Since a more conservative government got the power in the 80's the uniformity of the situation has altered.

obfuscation: We nowadays have a totally different situation .
original: We now have a totally different situation.

obfuscation: I wish to discuss why it is absolutely all-important that the parents and not the government have the power and right of decision about what school their children shall attend .
original: I wish to discuss why it is absolutely essential that the parents and not the government have the power and right of decision about what school their children shall attend.

obfuscation: The like arguments are valid about the importance of parental freedom to decide upon what kind of child care they prefer .
original: The same arguments are valid about the importance of parental freedom to decide upon what kind of child care they prefer.

obfuscation: WHY , THEN , IS IT SO IMPORTANT THAT PARENTS toilet CHOOSE SCHOOL - AND CHOOSE ANOTHER SCHOOL THAN THE STATE SUPPLY ?
original: WHY, THEN, IS IT SO IMPORTANT THAT PARENTS CAN CHOOSE SCHOOL - AND CHOOSE ANOTHER SCHOOL THAN THE STATE SUPPLY?

obfuscation: First of all , it is a human right to choose school according to your religious or philosophical belief .
original: First of all, it is a human right to choose school according to your religious or philosophical belief.

obfuscation: This is clearly stated in the United Nation 's declaration of human rights and also ratified by the Swedish country .
original: This is clearly stated in the United Nation's declaration of human rights and also ratified by the Swedish state.

obfuscation: The elementary schooling should also be free of charge , says the like declaration .
original: The elementary schooling should also be free of charge, says the same declaration.

obfuscation: But of course , this is not the alone reason why it is so important to have a possibility to select .
original: But of course, this is not the only reason why it is so important to have a possibility to select.

obfuscation: Another reason is that when people feel that they can affect this aspect of their childrens lives , they feel responsibility besides .
original: Another reason is that when people feel that they can affect this aspect of their childrens lives, they feel responsibility too.

obfuscation: They find urged to attend parents meeting at school and take a greater interest in their childrens schooling .
original: They feel urged to attend parents meeting at school and take a greater interest in their childrens schooling.

obfuscation: CA N'T THE FREEDOM TO SELECT A FREE SCHOOL CREATE A SEGREGATED club ?
original: CAN'T THE FREEDOM TO SELECT A FREE SCHOOL CREATE A SEGREGATED SOCIETY?

obfuscation: This is a very interesting thought you much hear from opponents to free schools .
original: This is a very interesting thought you often hear from opponents to free schools.

obfuscation: Could it be that such schools would consist entirely of rich and successful people 's children ?
original: Could it be that such schools would consist only of rich and successful people's children?

obfuscation: And perhaps - a even worse thought - entirely of white people , no immigrants and their descendants ?
original: And perhaps - a even worse thought - only of white people, no immigrants and their descendants?

obfuscation: No , I would say , whit the present system when the money follows the student every pupil has a chance to go to an independent school .
original: No, I would say, whit the present system when the money follows the pupil every pupil has a chance to go to an independent school.

obfuscation: When the money comes from the tax revenue , justice is maintained .
original: When the money comes from the tax revenue, justice is maintained.

obfuscation: It should NOT constitute a question of money if a parent wants to send his child to a non-state school .
original: It should NOT be a question of money if a parent wants to send his child to a non-state school.

obfuscation: The segregation in Sweden depends on housing policy .
original: The segregation in Sweden depends on housing policy.

obfuscation: This is a greater problem for the state comprehensive schools since wealthier people just can move from a problem area while others just have to stay and get their children in a sometimes bad school - if they do n't have a choice .
original: This is a greater problem for the state comprehensive schools since wealthier people just can move from a problem area while others just have to stay and have their children in a sometimes bad school - if they don't have a choice.

obfuscation: CA N'T THE FREEDOM TO CHOOSE ANOTHER SCHOOL IMPOVERISH THE STATE SCHOOLS ?
original: CAN'T THE FREEDOM TO CHOOSE ANOTHER SCHOOL IMPOVERISH THE STATE SCHOOLS?

obfuscation: This is a coarse question among defenders of state schools as the only alternative .
original: This is a common question among defenders of state schools as the only alternative.

obfuscation: I would say no , again .
original: I would say no, again.

obfuscation: On the contrary , since competition will force the state schools to be good or at least as good as independent schools it will benefit the whole society .
original: On the contrary, since competition will force the state schools to be better or at least as good as independent schools it will benefit the whole society.

obfuscation: Monopoly has never been a full option .
original: Monopoly has never been a good option.

obfuscation: In a initial stage an independent school could cause a small increase of the education costs in a local home , if the classes are very small .
original: In a initial stage an independent school could cause a small increase of the education costs in a local place, if the classes are very small.

obfuscation: But besides small schools do not get permission to start .
original: But too small schools do not get permission to start.

obfuscation: An independent school usually gets 85 % of a country schools budget in Sweden .
original: An independent school usually gets 85 % of a state schools budget in Sweden.

obfuscation: CONCLUSION .
original: CONCLUSION.

obfuscation: The independent reason why parents should be able to choose schools for their children is that this is a human right and a part of the freedom a citizen should enjoy .
original: The main reason why parents should be able to choose schools for their children is that this is a human right and a part of the freedom a citizen should enjoy.

obfuscation: But it also good if the parents become more involved in their children 's schooling and if they feel they can choose , this is a consequence .
original: But it also good if the parents get more involved in their children's schooling and if they feel they can choose, this is a consequence.

obfuscation: The competition between state and independent schools will make better schools and it would be stupid to go back to the previous situation .
original: The competition between state and independent schools will create better schools and it would be stupid to go back to the previous situation.
